testsuite.system-out:
Validate Personal Details Form.

From Job dropdown, Select FULL TIME.

Selected Job Type as FullTime. Selected Job Type - Full time

From Job listing option select QA Engineer.

get Current Url https://numadic.com/careers/

Verify button ‘Apply here now’ and perform a click action.

Verify Page load successfully. Page load status: complete Page redirects back to the Careers Page. Validate redirected page is the same Career Page

Verify redirect back to careers page.

Verify existence of Apply here now button in the page. Apply here now button is exist in the page. Click on Apply here now button Page has been redirected back to Careers Page.

On listing page, hover over QA Engineer, click ‘Apply’ button.

Hover on QAEngineer option. Hover on the Element. Move to the Apply Button Click on Apply Button.
